咁講喇，display equipment 講嘅"retina" or not 衹係一個marketing term
我地呢度狹意咁用黎代表一個"indistinguishable pixel from normal viewing distance" 嘅標準

quote.msg: amoled係一個行業共用嘅term黎 active matrix，boe tcl呢啲oled廠都係用緊呢個term， retina係apple自創standard

AMOLED、OLED、miniLED、LCD 係唔同技術；Retina 係 Apple 用來講"高清mon"的 term, 兩件事都唔關事

iPhone 4、iPad、MacBook 用 LCD，叫 Retina display
iPhone X 用 OLED 都一樣係 Retina display

咁講喇，display equipment 講嘅"retina" or not 衹係一個marketing term
我地呢度狹意咁用黎代表一個"indistinguishable pixel from normal viewing distance" 嘅標準

有爭議都歡迎搵一個更中立嘅term 去代表呢個標準

indistinguishable pixel 對於電話黎講十年前已經解決
更多比人用黎衡量嘅係pixel density of VR display
Venturebeat, Arstechnica editors 都用"retina" 呢個term 作為標準
Varjo ships $5,995 VR-1 headset with retina display for industrial VR
https://venturebeat.com/2019/02/19/varjo-ships-5995-vr-1-headset-with-retina-display-for-industrial-vr/
Retina resolution headset puts the “reality” into “virtual reality”
https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2019/02/retina-resolution-headset-puts-the-reality-into-virtual-reality/

返返正題，明明一個十年前hi-end smartphone 解決咗嘅mobile display 標準而家俾某廠嘅hi-end smart phone 倒行逆施去到正常肉眼距離睇得出, 唔係一種regression 同greediness?

AMOLED、OLED、miniLED、LCD 係唔同技術；Retina 係 Apple 用來講"高清mon"的 term, 兩件事都唔關事

iPhone 4、iPad、MacBook 用 LCD，叫 Retina display
iPhone X 用 OLED 都一樣係 Retina display

咁講喇，display equipment 講嘅"retina" or not 衹係一個marketing term
我地呢度狹意咁用黎代表一個"indistinguishable pixel from normal viewing distance" 嘅標準

有爭議都歡迎搵一個更中立嘅term 去代表呢個標準

indistinguishable pixel 對於電話黎講十年前已經解決
更多比人用黎衡量嘅係pixel density of VR display
Venturebeat, Arstechnica editors 都用"retina" 呢個term 作為標準
Varjo ships $5,995 VR-1 headset with retina display for industrial VR
https://venturebeat.com/2019/02/19/varjo-ships-5995-vr-1-headset-with-retina-display-for-industrial-vr/
Retina resolution headset puts the “reality” into “virtual reality”
https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2019/02/retina-resolution-headset-puts-the-reality-into-virtual-reality/

返返正題，明明一個十年前hi-end smartphone 解決咗嘅mobile display 標準而家俾某廠嘅hi-end smart phone 倒行逆施去到正常肉眼距離睇得出, 唔係一種regression 同greediness?
